CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Economic Area (EEA), with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 03B03

ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Oslo Universitetssykehus HF — Strategi og anskaffelsesavdelingen MTV

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Oslo Universitetssykehus HF — Strategi og anskaffelsesavdelingen MTV

TITLE.P: 75082 RH OPK Orthopaedic Department Autoclave — 75167 RH HLK KIT Thorax Surgery Department of Transplant Medicine Autoclave

SHORT_DESCR.P: Oslo University Hospital will procure two units and one option (as per operation 2) single door steam sterilisers (approx. two sterilisation devices) for sterilisation of invasive medical equipment, i.a. surgical instruments, thermostable endoscopic equipment, anaesthesia equipment and sterilisation of breast implants. Steam sterilisers must have steam generators and a water purification system for steam production. Factory testing documentation must be in place and be approved by OUS before delivery. The number of cycles is anticipated to be approx. 3-4 per day per autoclave/240 working days per year.

Sterilisation device/container dimensions: (L58 x B28 x H21), (L60 x B28 x H13), (L54 mm x B26 mm x H15 mm), (L60 mm x B40 mm x H20 mm), (L70 mm x B28 mm x H20 mm) but the chamber must be dimension to and be able to run containing equipment with a width of 34.5 cm.

Oslo University Hospital will procure two units and one option (as per operation 2) single door steam sterilisers (approx. two sterilisation devices) for sterilisation of invasive medical equipment, i.a. surgical instruments, thermostable endoscopic equipment, anaesthesia equipment and sterilisation of breast implants. Steam sterilisers must have steam generators and a water purification system for steam production. Factory testing documentation must be in place and be approved by OUS before delivery. The number of cycles is anticipated to be approx. 3-4 per day per autoclave/240 working days per year.

Sterilisation device/container dimensions: (L58 x B28 x H21), (L60 x B28 x H13), (L54 mm x B26 mm x H15 mm), (L60 mm x B40 mm x H20 mm), (L70 mm x B28 mm x H20 mm) but the chamber must be dimension to and be able to run containing equipment with a width of 34.5 cm.
External measurement are preferably the same for both of the surgical departments but is a challenge due to the container size.
Operating theatre 1 D2.4052:
Maximum space is:
Depth: enter the outer measurement depth (must be able to take container L70 mm x B28 mm x H20 mm, L60 mm x B28 mm x H13 mm), (L54B x B26 mm x 15 mm).
Width: 900 mm-1 000 mm
Height: Can be a little higher than 1 970 mm
Operating theatre 2 D3.4023:
Maximum space is:
External measurements:
Depth: 1 020 mm (must be able to sterilise the sterilisation device (must be able to hold the sterilisation device: (L58 mm x B28 mm x H21 mm), (L62 mm x B42 mm x H20 mm)/L60 mm x B20 mm x H20 mm)
Width: 900 mm-950 mm
Height: can be a little higher than 1 970

The steam steriliser delivered must be able to be transported into the named sterilisation room without building intervention (structural works). OUS will not perform any alteration of doors/transport routes in the corridors to get the sterilisers into the sterilisation room, due to patient activity.
Transport route:
Door into the sterilisation room
Opr. 2 : 87.5 cm x 203.5 cm
Operating theatre 1 : 98 cm x 209 cm
One extra steam steriliser at Rikshospitalet [the National Hospital] needs to be replaced and we would like a price for one device as an option.

OPTIONS_DESCR.P: 1.1: Steam steriliser (single door) with integrated steam generator and RO system (for OUS) similar to operating theatre 2;
Abidance of the option in point 1 must be four years, with CPI changing after 2 years.
The acceptance period for the option in point 2 is until the end of the guarantee period + 3 years.
The contracting authority will have a unilateral right, but not a duty to take up the option.

TITLE.P: 75082 RH OPK Orthopaedic Department Autoclave — 75167 RH HLK KIT Thorax Surgery Department of Transplant Medicine Autoclave
